job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Full-Stack Software Developer, you will build and maintain our Conversational AI platform by integrating various ABN AMRO services and AI solutions to enhance customer service experiences through Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR, and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   At Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate our conversational bot, interactive voice response (IVR) systems, and internal Advisor Assist tools.

   Within the Platform team, you will be responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our Conversational AI Platform to support new features, ABN AMRO service integrations, and developments in the realm of Generative AI.

   Key Subject Areas:
     * Working on ABN AMRO service integrations for conversational solutions.
     * Enhancing platform tooling, including labeling and data annotation.
     * Expanding features for our Advisor Assist tooling., * Build and maintain applications within the scope of the Platform team.
     * Support the refinement and solution of features and projects.
     * Coach and guide junior developers.

Working at Customer Interaction

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team that owns products with end-to-end responsibility. Within our extended team of approximately 50 colleagues, you will collaborate closely with other developers, data scientists, data engineers, UX designers, content writers, and business analysts to achieve common goals.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer NodeJS

As a Full-Stack Software Developer, you will build and maintain our Conversational AI platform by integrating various ABN AMRO services and AI solutions to enhance customer service experiences through Chatbot Anna, Conversational IVR, and LLM-based Advisor Assist.

   At Team Advanced Conversational Engagement, part of the Customer Interaction Domain, we maintain and innovate our conversational bot, interactive voice response (IVR) systems, and internal Advisor Assist tools.

   Within the Platform team, you will be responsible for maintaining, enhancing, and innovating our Conversational AI Platform to support new features, ABN AMRO service integrations, and developments in the realm of Generative AI.

   Key Subject Areas:
     * Working on ABN AMRO service integrations for conversational solutions.
     * Enhancing platform tooling, including labeling and data annotation.
     * Expanding features for our Advisor Assist tooling., * Build and maintain applications within the scope of the Platform team.
     * Support the refinement and solution of features and projects.
     * Coach and guide junior developers.

Working at Customer Interaction

   You will be part of a multidisciplinary scrum team that owns products with end-to-end responsibility. Within our extended team of approximately 50 colleagues, you will collaborate closely with other developers, data scientists, data engineers, UX designers, content writers, and business analysts to achieve common goals.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a Full Stack Developer role integrating existing services and AI solutions into a conversational AI platform. While it mentions Generative AI and LLM-based Advisor Assist, the core responsibilities and tasks described lean heavily towards traditional software development, platform enhancement, and integration rather than the core development, fine-tuning, or deep specialization in generative models characteristic of a GenAI Engineer. The role appears to be more about utilizing AI tools and integrating AI solutions into existing systems, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile's definition of primarily focusing on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity or traditional software engineering.
